values.description: Short put backspread, a combination of bear put spread and short put, consists of buying a higher-strike put and selling two lower-srtike puts with the same expiry.
values.keywords: shrot put backspread, bear put spread, limited-reward-limited-risk strategy, strategy payoff, early assignment
